task.title: Fix missing Relaycast->Dashboard message visibility in local dashboard

events.content: Route dashboard-originated injections through broker Relaycast identity: Route dashboard-originated injections through broker Relaycast identity

raw.question: Route dashboard-originated injections through broker Relaycast identity
raw.chosen: Route dashboard-originated injections through broker Relaycast identity
raw.reasoning: Workers were instructed to reply to literal Dashboard, which broker WS cannot receive when broker identity is broker-*; using broker identity for delivery and preserving Dashboard as display fixes inbound visibility.

retrospective.summary: Fixed missing Relaycast agent->Dashboard visibility by routing dashboard-originated deliveries through broker identity and normalizing UI target/display back to Dashboard; added DM participant-based target resolution and tests; rebuilt release broker binary.
